IndicatorShortName: Tourism in Outer Islands as Proportion to Total
Calculation/Formulation: Total number of outer islands visitors divided by the total number of visitors arrivals from overseas.
SourceTag: Table 7: Visitors travelling to outer islands , Vanuatu and Table 1: Summary of overseas Migration , International Arrival Statistics December publication
source_organisation_1: 2017 International Arrivals Statistics Monthly Report (December), VNSO
source_organisation_2: 2018 International Arrivals Statistics Monthly Report (December), VNSO
graph_title: Proportion of visitors traveling to outer islands
goal_name: A strong rural economy that creates opportunities, enables the development of rural communities and increasingly contributes to national prosperity
target_name: Deepen the integration of the tourism sector into the rural economy to spread opportunities to rural communities
indicator_name: Proportion of visitors traveling to outer islands
